pronunciation.pinyin: shù gāo qiān zhàng , yè luò guī gēn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1

meanings.value: fig. a tree may grow a thousand zhang high, but its leaves return to their roots (proverb)
fig. everything has its ancestral home
in old age, an expatriate returns home
